@ramonh I don't know why, but this still lets me add myself as a coach on the same team as I am a student on, via the interface. It also lets me add myself to that same team as a mentor, etc.. via the separate "Add a member" interface. 😕
The first might have something to do with the confirmation (maybe has_many :members, -> { uniq }, class_name: 'User' doesn't take into account the non-confirmed role as a role to double-check for uniqueness of name) but the second, I have absolutely no idea.

The first might have something to do with the confirmation (maybe `has_many :members, -> { uniq }, class_name: 'User'` doesn't take into account the non-confirmed role as a role to double-check for uniqueness of name) but the second, I have absolutely no idea.
